My Internship Journal Branding

My Internship Journal Branding

Over the years Iâ€™ve gotten tired of just sharing a .pdf via email when presenting logo options and wanted something with a little more impact. So when I was hired to create a new brand identity for this product I decided to create a webpage that would reveal a new concept with a single swipe or click of a button so that the client would be able to see one concept at a time without any distractions. I also included an option to reverse the color scheme with a simple toggleClass on click. Using Sass I set the background color and background image containing the logo to a specific class name and switched the class of the container element with JavaScript. The client expressed their excitement to me over the phone, stating that it was really cool to see the logos in this format and that each time they swiped to a new option it was like opening a present. I plan on using this repository as a template for future presentations.
